physical_examinations.relevant_findings: HAART initiated with zidovudine plus didanosine.
Initiated HAART with zidovudine, lamivudine, and indinavir.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially effective in reducing HIV RNA plasma levels by 3 log10.
No immunologic benefit; CD4 counts consistently below 100 cells/mL.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Developed HCMV retinitis with disseminated HCMV infection.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Relapses observed in February 1997 while on foscarnet maintenance.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: HIV RNA load was 1,000,000 copies/mL; CD4 count was 8 cells/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: First episode of ophthalmologically documented HCMV retinitis.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Second episode of HCMV retinitis developed after ganciclovir maintenance.
